lead_paragraph: As relief teams struggle to reach earthquake victims in isolated areas, some aid workers said they were worried that attention had already strayed from Nepal.

headline.print_headline: Rescue Teams Move On From a Once-Lively Village Wiped Out by Quake
headline.main: Nepalese Village, Devastated by Quake, Is Left to Cope as International Attention Shifts

snippet: As relief teams struggle to reach earthquake victims in isolated areas, some aid workers said they were worried that attention had already strayed from Nepal.
abstract: International search and rescue teams have moved on from Nepalese village of Langtang, once popular with backpackers but now wiped out by earthquake; some aid workers in country worry that international attention to disaster is fading, and along with it that funding will dry up for relief efforts.
